Only they may grace His flesh.

socketedItems.typeLine: Divergent Cast when Damage Taken Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 69 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3142 total Damage from Hits
Supported Skills require 20% reduced amount of Damage taken to Trigger
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.

items.name: Viper March
enchantMods: 18% reduced Mana Cost of Skills if you've been Hit Recently
explicitMods: 11% increased Movement Speed if you haven't been Hit Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 45% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 154% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Reserves mana to apply a buff and leave afterimages of your recent past. Cast the spell again to return to the oldest afterimage, teleporting to that location as well as resetting your Life, Mana and Energy Shield to the values they had then.
explicitMods: Buff grants 5% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified
Buff makes you Unaffected by Temporal Chains
